name: 1 Room Demon Slayer
description:
Game created for 1 Room RPG Jam. You need to kill a deamon, which will only spawn from lower-tier enemies. Make sure that you are well prepared by collecting ammo and obtaining the amulet of teleportation.

Check out the readme file for more details.

Gameplay video: http://i.imgur.com/SfVWZVL.gif

Enjoy!
